moreBlocks.articles:
• Auto Accidents
    The effects of a car accident are far reaching. The attorneys at Bremer & Trollop understand the Wisconsin Rules of the Road and the complexities of motor vehicle accidents.
  • Workers'Comp
    When you are injured on the job, it is the responsibility of your employer to cover your medical expenses and lost wages. By law, all employers must cover expenses resulting from employees' injuries received while on the job.
  • Hunting & Firearm Accidents
    While the vast majority of hunters in central Wisconsin follow safety guidelines, there are always exceptions to the rule. A hunting accident can forever change the life of the person injured.

description:
If you live in Langlade County, Wisconsin, or any of the surrounding areas, and you suffered a serious injury or lost a loved one due to another party's negligence or wrongdoing, you can turn to the legal professionals at Bremer & Trollop Law Offices, S.C., for the impassioned advocacy you need to help you get the justice you deserve.

Regarded as one of Wisconsin's premier personal injury practices, the law firm has more than 30 years serving its community. Bremer & Trollop Law Offices, S.C., has grown to include five total law offices across the state. The firm's lawyers have extensive legal experience to help you make the best-informed decisions, and they will fight aggressively to help you obtain the favorable outcomes you seek.

Over the years, they have recovered millions of dollars in total compensation for their plaintiff clients adversely affected by motor vehicle accidents, asbestos and toxic exposure, defective medical devices, workplace injuries, and more. This means you can count on them to do whatever they can to help you obtain the maximum amount of compensation to which you are entitled.

As a result of their success, the firm's lawyers have earned AV Preeminent peer review ratings* from Martindale-Hubbell, Top 100 Trial Lawyer rankings from the National Trial Lawyers and many other accolades, awards and endorsements from their peers. Moreover, they have received numerous testimonials and referrals from their satisfied clients, and you can trust in them to help you make your life whole again following an unfortunate but preventable tragedy.

To begin the process, you can contact Bremer & Trollop Law Offices, S.C., to receive a free evaluation of your claim from a local attorney who has your best interests at heart. In these uncertain times, the firm also offers virtual consultations so that you do not have to further risk your health and safety to speak with them.

*AV®, AV Preeminent®, Martindale-Hubbell Distinguished and Martindale-Hubbell Notable are certification marks used under license in accordance with the Martindale-Hubbell certification procedures, standards and policies. Martindale-Hubbell® is the facilitator of a peer review rating process. Ratings reflect the anonymous opinions of members of the bar and the judiciary. Martindale-Hubbell® Peer Review RatingTM fall into two categories - legal ability and general ethical standards.
